verses.kjv: Paul, an apostle of Jesus Christ by the commandment of God our Saviour, and Lord Jesus Christ, which is our hope;
verses.ct: Paul, an apostle of Christ Jesus by the command of God our Savior and Christ Jesus, who is our hope —

verses.kjv: Unto Timothy, my own son in the faith: Grace, mercy, and peace, from God our Father and Jesus Christ our Lord.
verses.ct: To Timothy, my true son in the faith: Grace, mercy, and peace from God our Father and Christ Jesus our Lord.

verses.kjv: As I besought thee to abide still at Ephesus, when I went into Macedonia, that thou mightest charge some that they teach no other doctrine,
verses.ct: Just as I urged you to stay in Ephesus when I left for Macedonia, I want you to instruct certain people to stop teaching false doctrines.

verses.kjv: Neither give heed to fables and endless genealogies, which minister questions, rather than godly edifying which is in faith: so do.
verses.ct: Tell them not to pay attention to myths and never-ending genealogies, which only produce speculation instead of advancing God's work, which is rooted in faith.

verses.kjv: Now the end of the commandment is charity out of a pure heart, and of a good conscience, and of faith unfeigned:
verses.ct: The whole purpose of this instruction is love that comes from a pure heart, a clear conscience, and genuine faith.

verses.kjv: From which some having swerved have turned aside unto vain jangling;
verses.ct: Some people have wandered away from these things and drifted into pointless arguments.

verses.kjv: Desiring to be teachers of the law; understanding neither what they say, nor whereof they affirm.
verses.ct: They want to be experts in the law, but they don't even understand what they're saying or the claims they're so confidently making.

verses.kjv: But we know that the law is good, if a man use it lawfully;
verses.ct: We know that the law is good, as long as someone uses it the way it was intended.

verses.kjv: Knowing this, that the law is not made for a righteous man, but for the lawless and disobedient, for the ungodly and for sinners, for unholy and profane, for murderers of fathers and murderers of mothers, for manslayers,
verses.ct: We must recognize that the law wasn't designed for righteous people, but for those who are lawless and rebellious, ungodly and sinful, unholy and irreverent, for those who kill their fathers or mothers, for murderers,

verses.kjv: For whoremongers, for them that defile themselves with mankind, for menstealers, for liars, for perjured persons, and if there be any other thing that is contrary to sound doctrine;
verses.ct: for the sexually immoral, for men who practice homosexuality, for slave traders, for liars, for those who give false testimony, and for anything else that goes against healthy teaching.

verses.kjv: According to the glorious gospel of the blessed God, which was committed to my trust.
verses.ct: This is all consistent with the glorious gospel of the blessed God, which he entrusted to me.

verses.kjv: And I thank Christ Jesus our Lord, who hath enabled me, for that he counted me faithful, putting me into the ministry;
verses.ct: I'm grateful to Christ Jesus our Lord, who gave me strength, because he considered me trustworthy and appointed me to his service.

verses.kjv: Who was before a blasphemer, and a persecutor, and injurious: but I obtained mercy, because I did it ignorantly in unbelief.
verses.ct: Even though I was previously someone who spoke against God, who persecuted his people, and who acted with violence — I still received mercy because I acted out of ignorance and unbelief.

verses.kjv: And the grace of our Lord was exceeding abundant with faith and love which is in Christ Jesus.
verses.ct: The grace of our Lord overflowed beyond measure, along with the faith and love that are found in Christ Jesus.

verses.kjv: This is a faithful saying, and worthy of all acceptation, that Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners; of whom I am chief.
verses.ct: Here is a statement that is trustworthy and deserves complete acceptance: Christ Jesus came into the world to save sinners — and I am the worst of them.

verses.kjv: Howbeit for this cause I obtained mercy, that in me first Jesus Christ might shew forth all longsuffering, for a pattern to them which should hereafter believe on him to life everlasting.
verses.ct: But that is exactly why I received mercy — so that in me, the worst sinner, Christ Jesus could demonstrate his unlimited patience as an example for everyone who would later put their trust in him and receive eternal life.

verses.kjv: Now unto the King eternal, immortal, invisible, the only wise God, be honour and glory for ever and ever. Amen.
verses.ct: Now to the King who is eternal, immortal, and invisible, the only wise God — honor and glory forever and ever. Amen.

verses.kjv: This charge I commit unto thee, son Timothy, according to the prophecies which went before on thee, that thou by them mightest war a good warfare;
verses.ct: Timothy, my son, I am giving you this charge in keeping with the prophecies once spoken over you, so that through them you may fight the good fight,

verses.kjv: Holding faith, and a good conscience; which some having put away concerning faith have made shipwreck:
verses.ct: holding on to faith and a clear conscience. Some people have rejected these and have wrecked their faith completely.

verses.kjv: Of whom is Hymenaeus and Alexander; whom I have delivered unto Satan, that they may learn not to blaspheme.
verses.ct: Among them are Hymenaeus and Alexander, whom I have handed over to Satan so they will learn not to speak against God.
